properties.name: toolDescription
properties.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

options.description: Product external button text. Only for external products.

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: after
options.description: Limit response to resources published after a given ISO8601 compliant date

options.name: before
options.description: Limit response to resources published before a given ISO8601 compliant date

options.name: category
options.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific category ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: context
options.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response

options.name: featured
options.description: Whether to limit the result set to featured products

options.name: maxPrice
options.description: Limit result set to products based on a maximun price

options.name: minPrice
options.description: Limit result set to products based on a minimum price

options.name: order
options.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending

options.name: orderBy
options.description: Sort collection by object attribute

options.name: search
options.description: Limit results to those matching a string

options.name: sku
options.description: Limit result set to products with a specific SKU

options.name: slug
options.description: Limit result set to products with a specific slug

options.name: status
options.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific status

options.name: stockStatus
options.description: Controls the stock status of the product

options.name: tag
options.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific tag ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: taxClass
options.description: Limit result set to products with a specific tax class
